panels.description: Size of the table including all indexes and TOAST data

targets.query: SELECT mean("total_relation_size_b") FROM "table_stats" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND "table_full_name" =~ /^$table_full_name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(none)
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  avg((data->>'table_size_b')::int8) as table_size,
  avg((data->>'total_relation_size_b')::int8) as total_relation_size,
  avg((data->>'toast_size_b')::int8) as toast_size
FROM
  table_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND dbname = '$dbname'
  AND tag_data @> jsonb_build_object('table_full_name', '$table_full_name')
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Table Size

panels.description: Sequential and index scans performed on the table (1h rate, aggregated by interval)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  avg( ((seq_scan-seq_scan_lag)::numeric*3600) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag) ) as seq_scan,
  avg( ((idx_scan-idx_scan_lag)::numeric*3600) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag) ) as idx_scan
FROM (  
  SELECT
    (data->>'seq_scan')::int8 as seq_scan, lag((data->>'seq_scan')::int8) over w as seq_scan_lag,
    (data->>'idx_scan')::int8 as idx_scan, lag((data->>'idx_scan')::int8) over w as idx_scan_lag,
    time, lag(time) over w as time_lag  
  FROM
    table_stats
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(time) AND dbname = '$dbname'
    AND tag_data @> jsonb_build_object('table_full_name', '$table_full_name')
  WINDOW w as (order by time)
) x
WHERE seq_scan >= seq_scan_lag and time > time_lag
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Table Scans

panels.description: Insert, Update, and Delete operations on the table (1h rate, aggregated by interval)

targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  avg((ins-ins_lag) * 3600 / extract(epoch from time - time_lag)) as "INSERT",
  avg((upd-upd_lag) * 3600 / extract(epoch from time - time_lag)) as "UPDATE",
  avg((del-del_lag) * 3600 / extract(epoch from time - time_lag)) as "DELETE"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'n_tup_ins')::int8 as ins, lag((data->>'n_tup_ins')::int8) over w as ins_lag,
          (data->>'n_tup_upd')::int8 as upd, lag((data->>'n_tup_upd')::int8) over w as upd_lag,
          (data->>'n_tup_del')::int8 as del, lag((data->>'n_tup_del')::int8) over w as del_lag,
          time, lag(time) over w as time_lag
        from table_stats
        where dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
        and tag_data @> jsonb_build_object('table_full_name', '$table_full_name')
        window w as (order by time)

) x
where ins >= ins_lag and time > time_lag
group by 1
order by 1

panels.title: Data Modifications

panels.description: Cache hit rates for heap, index, and TOAST data (aggregated by interval)

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("heap_blks_hit"), 10s) /  (non_negative_derivative(mean("heap_blks_hit"), 10s) + non_negative_derivative(mean("heap_blks_read"), 10s)) * 100 FROM "table_io_stats" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND "table_full_name" =~ /^$table_full_name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  avg( case when hh = hh_lag and hr = hr_lag then null else (hh-hh_lag)::numeric * 100 / (hh-hh_lag+hr-hr_lag) end ) as "Heap",
  avg( case when ih = ih_lag and ir = ir_lag then null else (ih-ih_lag)::numeric * 100 / (ih-ih_lag+ir-ir_lag) end ) as "Indexes"  
from (
        select 
          (data->>'heap_blks_hit')::int8 as hh, lag((data->>'heap_blks_hit')::int8) over w as hh_lag,
          (data->>'heap_blks_read')::int8 as hr, lag((data->>'heap_blks_read')::int8) over w as hr_lag,
          (data->>'idx_blks_hit')::int8 as ih, lag((data->>'idx_blks_hit')::int8) over w as ih_lag,
          (data->>'idx_blks_read')::int8 as ir, lag((data->>'idx_blks_read')::int8) over w as ir_lag,
          time
        from table_io_stats
        where dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
        and tag_data @> jsonb_build_object('table_full_name', '$table_full_name')
        window w as (order by time)
) x
where hh >= hh_lag
group by 1
order by 1

panels.title: Shared Buffer Hit Rates

panels.description: Index scans per individual index (1h rate, aggregated by interval)

targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  index_name,
  avg( ((idx_scan - idx_scan_lag)::numeric * 3600) / extract(epoch from time - time_lag) )
from (
        select 
          (data->>'idx_scan')::int8 as idx_scan, lag((data->>'idx_scan')::int8) over w as idx_scan_lag,
          tag_data->>'index_name' as index_name,
          time, lag(time) over w as time_lag
        from index_stats
        where dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
        and tag_data @> jsonb_build_object('table_full_name', '$table_full_name')
        window w as (order by time)
) x
where idx_scan >= idx_scan_lag and time > time_lag
group by 1, 2
order by 1, 2

panels.title: Index Scan Activity

panels.description: Time since last VACUUM including manual and AUTOVACUUM (1 month warning, 2 month error threshold)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  0 as time,
  (data->>'seconds_since_last_vacuum')::int8
FROM
  table_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND dbname = '$dbname'
  AND tag_data @> jsonb_build_object('table_full_name', '$table_full_name')
ORDER BY time DESC
LIMIT 1

panels.title: Last VACUUM

panels.description: Time since last ANALYZE including manual and auto-ANALYZE (1 month warning, 2 month error threshold)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  0 as time,
  (data->>'seconds_since_last_analyze')::int8
FROM
  table_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time)
  AND dbname = '$dbname'
  AND tag_data @> jsonb_build_object('table_full_name', '$table_full_name')
ORDER BY time DESC
LIMIT 1

panels.title: Last ANALYZE

targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  sum(ins-ins_lag) as "INSERT"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'n_tup_ins')::int8 as ins,
          lag((data->>'n_tup_ins')::int8) over w as ins_lag,
          time
        from
          table_stats
        where
          dbname = '$dbname'
          and tag_data @> jsonb_build_object('table_full_name', '$table_full_name')
          and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)

) x
where ins >= ins_lag
group by 1
order by 1

select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  sum(ins-ins_lag) as "INSERT-$lag_interval"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'n_tup_ins')::int8 as ins,
          lag((data->>'n_tup_ins')::int8) over w as ins_lag,
          time + '$lag_interval'::interval as time
        from
          table_stats
        where
          dbname = '$dbname'
          and tag_data @> jsonb_build_object('table_full_name', '$table_full_name')
          and time between ($__timeFrom()::timestamptz - '$lag_interval'::interval) and ($__timeTo()::timestamptz - '$lag_interval'::interval)
        window w as (order by time)

) x
where ins >= ins_lag
group by 1
order by 1

select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  sum(upd-upd_lag) as "UPDATE"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'n_tup_upd')::int8 as upd,
          lag((data->>'n_tup_upd')::int8) over w as upd_lag,
          time
        from
          table_stats
        where
          dbname = '$dbname'
          and tag_data @> jsonb_build_object('table_full_name', '$table_full_name')
          and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)

) x
where upd >= upd_lag
group by 1
order by 1

select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  sum(upd-upd_lag) as "UPDATE-$lag_interval"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'n_tup_upd')::int8 as upd,
          lag((data->>'n_tup_upd')::int8) over w as upd_lag,
          time + '$lag_interval'::interval as time
        from
          table_stats
        where
          dbname = '$dbname'
          and tag_data @> jsonb_build_object('table_full_name', '$table_full_name')
          and time between ($__timeFrom()::timestamptz - '$lag_interval'::interval) and ($__timeTo()::timestamptz - '$lag_interval'::interval)
        window w as (order by time)

) x
where upd >= upd_lag
group by 1
order by 1

select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  sum(del-del_lag) as "DELETE"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'n_tup_del')::int8 as del,
          lag((data->>'n_tup_del')::int8) over w as del_lag,
          time
        from
          table_stats
        where
          dbname = '$dbname'
          and tag_data @> jsonb_build_object('table_full_name', '$table_full_name')
          and $__timeFilter(time)
        window w as (order by time)

) x
where del >= del_lag
group by 1
order by 1

select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  sum(del-del_lag) as "DELETE-$lag_interval"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'n_tup_del')::int8 as del,
          lag((data->>'n_tup_del')::int8) over w as del_lag,
          time + '$lag_interval'::interval as time
        from
          table_stats
        where
          dbname = '$dbname'
          and tag_data @> jsonb_build_object('table_full_name', '$table_full_name')
          and time between ($__timeFrom()::timestamptz - '$lag_interval'::interval) and ($__timeTo()::timestamptz - '$lag_interval'::interval)
        window w as (order by time)

) x
where del >= del_lag
group by 1
order by 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  sum(seq_scan-seq_scan_lag) as seq_scan
FROM (  
  SELECT
    (data->>'seq_scan')::int8 as seq_scan, lag((data->>'seq_scan')::int8) over w as seq_scan_lag,
    time
  FROM
    table_stats
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(time) AND dbname = '$dbname'
    AND tag_data @> jsonb_build_object('table_full_name', '$table_full_name')
  WINDOW w as (order by time)
) x
WHERE seq_scan >= seq_scan_lag
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  sum(seq_scan-seq_scan_lag) as "seq_scan-$lag_interval"
FROM (  
  SELECT
    (data->>'seq_scan')::int8 as seq_scan, lag((data->>'seq_scan')::int8) over w as seq_scan_lag,
    time + '$lag_interval'::interval as time
  FROM
    table_stats
  WHERE
    time between ($__timeFrom()::timestamptz - '$lag_interval'::interval) and ($__timeTo()::timestamptz - '$lag_interval'::interval)
    AND dbname = '$dbname'
    AND tag_data @> jsonb_build_object('table_full_name', '$table_full_name')
  WINDOW w as (order by time)
) x
WHERE seq_scan >= seq_scan_lag
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  sum(idx_scan-idx_scan_lag) as idx_scan
FROM (  
  SELECT
    (data->>'idx_scan')::int8 as idx_scan, lag((data->>'idx_scan')::int8) over w as idx_scan_lag,
    time
  FROM
    table_stats
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(time) AND dbname = '$dbname'
    AND tag_data @> jsonb_build_object('table_full_name', '$table_full_name')
  WINDOW w as (order by time)
) x
WHERE idx_scan >= idx_scan_lag
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  sum(idx_scan-idx_scan_lag) as "idx_scan-$lag_interval"
FROM (  
  SELECT
    (data->>'idx_scan')::int8 as idx_scan, lag((data->>'idx_scan')::int8) over w as idx_scan_lag,
    time + '$lag_interval'::interval as time
  FROM
    table_stats
  WHERE
    time between ($__timeFrom()::timestamptz - '$lag_interval'::interval) and ($__timeTo()::timestamptz - '$lag_interval'::interval)
    AND dbname = '$dbname'
    AND tag_data @> jsonb_build_object('table_full_name', '$table_full_name')
  WINDOW w as (order by time)
) x
WHERE idx_scan >= idx_scan_lag
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

panels.description: Hit rate for the main table excluding indexes and TOAST

targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  avg( case when hh = hh_lag and hr = hr_lag then null else (hh-hh_lag)::numeric * 100 / (hh-hh_lag+hr-hr_lag) end ) as "Heap hit"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'heap_blks_hit')::int8 as hh, lag((data->>'heap_blks_hit')::int8) over w as hh_lag,
          (data->>'heap_blks_read')::int8 as hr, lag((data->>'heap_blks_read')::int8) over w as hr_lag,
          time
        from table_io_stats
        where dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
        and tag_data @> jsonb_build_object('table_full_name', '$table_full_name')
        window w as (order by time)
) x
where hh >= hh_lag and hr >= hr_lag
group by 1
order by 1

select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  avg( case when hh = hh_lag and hr = hr_lag then null else (hh-hh_lag)::numeric * 100 / (hh-hh_lag+hr-hr_lag) end ) as "Heap hit-$lag_interval"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'heap_blks_hit')::int8 as hh, lag((data->>'heap_blks_hit')::int8) over w as hh_lag,
          (data->>'heap_blks_read')::int8 as hr, lag((data->>'heap_blks_read')::int8) over w as hr_lag,
          time +'$lag_interval'::interval as time
        from table_io_stats
        where dbname = '$dbname'
        and time between ($__timeFrom()::timestamptz - '$lag_interval'::interval) and ($__timeTo()::timestamptz - '$lag_interval'::interval)
        and tag_data @> jsonb_build_object('table_full_name', '$table_full_name')
        window w as (order by time)
) x
where hh >= hh_lag and hr >= hr_lag
group by 1
order by 1

panels.title: Shared Buffers Hit Rate - Heap

panels.description: Hit rate for the main table excluding indexes and TOAST

targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  100 * avg( case when tr = tr_lag and th = th_lag and tir = tir_lag and tih = tir_lag then null else (coalesce(th,0)-coalesce(th_lag,0) + coalesce(tih,0)-coalesce(tih_lag,0))::numeric / (coalesce(th,0)-coalesce(th_lag,0) + coalesce(tr,0)-coalesce(tr_lag,0) + coalesce(tir,0)-coalesce(tir_lag,0) + coalesce(tih,0)-coalesce(tih_lag,0)) end ) as "Toast hit"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'toast_blks_read')::int8 as tr, lag((data->>'toast_blks_read')::int8) over w as tr_lag,
          (data->>'toast_blks_hit')::int8 as th, lag((data->>'toast_blks_hit')::int8) over w as th_lag,
          (data->>'tidx_blks_read')::int8 as tir, lag((data->>'tidx_blks_read')::int8) over w as tir_lag,
          (data->>'tidx_blks_hit')::int8 as tih, lag((data->>'tidx_blks_hit')::int8) over w as tih_lag,
          time
        from table_io_stats
        where dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
        and tag_data @> jsonb_build_object('table_full_name', '$table_full_name')
        window w as (order by time)
) x
where th > th_lag or tih > tih_lag or tr > tr_lag or tir > tir_lag
group by 1
order by 1

select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  100 * avg( case when tr = tr_lag and th = th_lag and tir = tir_lag and tih = tir_lag then null else (coalesce(th,0)-coalesce(th_lag,0) + coalesce(tih,0)-coalesce(tih_lag,0))::numeric / (coalesce(th,0)-coalesce(th_lag,0) + coalesce(tr,0)-coalesce(tr_lag,0) + coalesce(tir,0)-coalesce(tir_lag,0) + coalesce(tih,0)-coalesce(tih_lag,0)) end ) as "Toast hit-$lag_interval"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'toast_blks_read')::int8 as tr, lag((data->>'toast_blks_read')::int8) over w as tr_lag,
          (data->>'toast_blks_hit')::int8 as th, lag((data->>'toast_blks_hit')::int8) over w as th_lag,
          (data->>'tidx_blks_read')::int8 as tir, lag((data->>'tidx_blks_read')::int8) over w as tir_lag,
          (data->>'tidx_blks_hit')::int8 as tih, lag((data->>'tidx_blks_hit')::int8) over w as tih_lag,
          time + '$lag_interval'::interval as time
        from table_io_stats
        where dbname = '$dbname'
        and time between ($__timeFrom()::timestamptz - '$lag_interval'::interval) and ($__timeTo()::timestamptz - '$lag_interval'::interval)
        and tag_data @> jsonb_build_object('table_full_name', '$table_full_name')
        window w as (order by time)
) x
where th > th_lag or tih > tih_lag or tr > tr_lag or tir > tir_lag
group by 1
order by 1

panels.title: Shared Buffers Hit Rate - Toast

panels.description: Block bandwidth for heap data (assuming 8k blocks)

targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  8192 * sum(hh-hh_lag+hr-hr_lag) as "Heap read"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'heap_blks_hit')::int8 as hh, lag((data->>'heap_blks_hit')::int8) over w as hh_lag,
          (data->>'heap_blks_read')::int8 as hr, lag((data->>'heap_blks_read')::int8) over w as hr_lag,
          time
        from table_io_stats
        where dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
        and tag_data @> jsonb_build_object('table_full_name', '$table_full_name')
        window w as (order by time)
) x
where hr >= hr_lag and hh >= hh_lag
group by 1
order by 1

select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  8192 * sum(hh-hh_lag+hr-hr_lag) as "Heap read-$lag_interval"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'heap_blks_hit')::int8 as hh, lag((data->>'heap_blks_hit')::int8) over w as hh_lag,
          (data->>'heap_blks_read')::int8 as hr, lag((data->>'heap_blks_read')::int8) over w as hr_lag,
          time + '$lag_interval'::interval as time
        from table_io_stats
        where dbname = '$dbname'
        and time between ($__timeFrom()::timestamptz - '$lag_interval'::interval) and ($__timeTo()::timestamptz - '$lag_interval'::interval)
        and tag_data @> jsonb_build_object('table_full_name', '$table_full_name')
        window w as (order by time)
) x
where hr >= hr_lag and hh >= hh_lag
group by 1
order by 1

panels.title: Block Bandwidth - Heap

panels.description: Block bandwidth for index data (assuming 8k blocks)

targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  8192 * sum(ih-ih_lag+ir-ir_lag) as "Idx read"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'idx_blks_hit')::int8 as ih, lag((data->>'idx_blks_hit')::int8) over w as ih_lag,
          (data->>'idx_blks_read')::int8 as ir, lag((data->>'idx_blks_read')::int8) over w as ir_lag,
          time
        from table_io_stats
        where dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
        and tag_data @> jsonb_build_object('table_full_name', '$table_full_name')
        window w as (order by time)
) x
where ir >= ir_lag and ih >= ih_lag
group by 1
order by 1

select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  8192 * sum(ih-ih_lag+ir-ir_lag) as "Idx read-$lag_interval"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'idx_blks_hit')::int8 as ih, lag((data->>'idx_blks_hit')::int8) over w as ih_lag,
          (data->>'idx_blks_read')::int8 as ir, lag((data->>'idx_blks_read')::int8) over w as ir_lag,
          time + '$lag_interval'::interval as time
        from table_io_stats
        where dbname = '$dbname'
        and time between ($__timeFrom()::timestamptz - '$lag_interval'::interval) and ($__timeTo()::timestamptz - '$lag_interval'::interval)
        and tag_data @> jsonb_build_object('table_full_name', '$table_full_name')
        window w as (order by time)
) x
where ir >= ir_lag and ih >= ih_lag
group by 1
order by 1

panels.title: Block Bandwidth - Indexes

panels.description: Block bandwidth for TOAST data (assuming 8k blocks)

targets.rawSql:
select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  8192 * sum(coalesce(th,0)-coalesce(th_lag,0) + coalesce(tr,0)-coalesce(tr_lag,0) + coalesce(tir,0)-coalesce(tir_lag,0) + coalesce(tih,0)-coalesce(tih_lag,0)) as "Toast read"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'toast_blks_read')::int8 as tr, lag((data->>'toast_blks_read')::int8) over w as tr_lag,
          (data->>'toast_blks_hit')::int8 as th, lag((data->>'toast_blks_hit')::int8) over w as th_lag,
          (data->>'tidx_blks_read')::int8 as tir, lag((data->>'tidx_blks_read')::int8) over w as tir_lag,
          (data->>'tidx_blks_hit')::int8 as tih, lag((data->>'tidx_blks_hit')::int8) over w as tih_lag,
          time
        from table_io_stats
        where dbname = '$dbname' and $__timeFilter(time)
        and tag_data @> jsonb_build_object('table_full_name', '$table_full_name')
        window w as (order by time)
) x
where th > th_lag or tih > tih_lag or tr > tr_lag or tir > tir_lag
group by 1
order by 1

select
  $__timeGroup(time, $agg_interval),
  8192 * sum(coalesce(th,0)-coalesce(th_lag,0) + coalesce(tr,0)-coalesce(tr_lag,0) + coalesce(tir,0)-coalesce(tir_lag,0) + coalesce(tih,0)-coalesce(tih_lag,0)) as "Toast read-$lag_interval"
from (
        select 
          (data->>'toast_blks_read')::int8 as tr, lag((data->>'toast_blks_read')::int8) over w as tr_lag,
          (data->>'toast_blks_hit')::int8 as th, lag((data->>'toast_blks_hit')::int8) over w as th_lag,
          (data->>'tidx_blks_read')::int8 as tir, lag((data->>'tidx_blks_read')::int8) over w as tir_lag,
          (data->>'tidx_blks_hit')::int8 as tih, lag((data->>'tidx_blks_hit')::int8) over w as tih_lag,
          time + '$lag_interval'::interval as time
        from table_io_stats
        where dbname = '$dbname'
        and time between ($__timeFrom()::timestamptz - '$lag_interval'::interval) and ($__timeTo()::timestamptz - '$lag_interval'::interval)
        and tag_data @> jsonb_build_object('table_full_name', '$table_full_name')
        window w as (order by time)
) x
where th > th_lag or tih > tih_lag or tr > tr_lag or tir > tir_lag
group by 1
order by 1

panels.title: Block Bandwidth - Toast

options.content:
### Brought to you by

list.label: Monitored Source
list.name: dbname
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT dbname FROM admin.all_distinct_dbname_metrics WHERE metric = 'table_stats' ORDER BY 1;

list.label: Table Full Name
list.name: table_full_name
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT tag_data->>'table_full_name' FROM table_stats WHERE time > current_date-3 AND dbname = '$dbname' ORDER BY 1
